params._currency: name of the donated ERC20 token
params.charity_wallet: Ethereum address of the organization to receive the donation
params.currency_address: Ethereum address of the donated ERC20 token
params.decimals: decimal precision of the donated ERC20 token
params.organization_ein: EIN of the organization to receive the donation
params.organization_name: name of the organization to receive the donation
